skins.selfIntroduction: I am the Fletcher-class destroyer Kimberly. I am normally tasked with escort and anti-submarine duties, so should the need arise, please do not hesitate to deploy me.
skins.acquisition: I am the Fletcher-class destroyer, Kimberly. From today onward, I will be one of your subordinates. Pleased to meet you.
skins.login: Being punctual is a good habit to have, so please keep it up.
skins.details: Just what are you looking at? You ought to hurry up and return to your post.
skins.secretaryIdle1: If you are tired, please take a break. If you were to collapse, the command chain would follow suit.
skins.secretaryIdle2: For me, no matter where I am, or what I am called, I will continue to fight on as long as I live.
skins.secretaryIdle3: I was born for battle and died for peace. Other than this fact, I won't dwell on anything else.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Do you want to pay a visit to the court martial?
skins.secretaryHeadpat: What is... the meaning of this?

skins.shipDescription: While wearing clothes from the Dragon Empery, I can't help but reminisce about those days... Hehe, Commander, do you prefer me in Empery-style clothes, or Union-style clothes?
skins.acquisition: When I change into clothes from the Dragon Empery, I can't help but to reminisce about the time I spent there... Commander, which style of clothes do you prefer - Union, or Empery?
skins.login: There is a proverb from the Dragon Empery: "A day's plans begin in the morning." Even if it's not the morning though, don't you think it's important to start off on the right foot, Commander?
skins.details: There are many differences between the Eagle Union and the Dragon Empery, but the one thing that doesn't change no matter where you are is everyone's desire for a better future.
skins.secretaryIdle1: My friends from the Dragon Empery told me about a lot of fascinating legends! Commander, do you want to hear them too?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Recently, I tried to learn the bamboo flute. Commander, want to give it a listen?
skins.secretaryTouch: There's still a lot of work left to do... but don't worry, Commander! Let's knock it out together!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander... you could go to jail for this, you know?
skins.secretaryHeadpat: C-Commander, the buns are going to get messed up...
